item.title: Text-Text Transformers
item.description: Catches from text to text transfer transformers: As an example, consider the case of English to German translation: If we have a training datapoint with input sentence “That is good.” and target “Das ist gut.”, we would simply train the model on next-step prediction over the concatenated input sequence “translate English to German: That is good. target: Das ist gut.” If we wanted to obtain the model’s prediction for this example, the model would be fed the prefix “translate English to German: That is good.

item.title: Text-Text Transformers
item.description: Catches from text to text transfer transformers: As an example, consider the case of English to German translation: If we have a training datapoint with input sentence “That is good.” and target “Das ist gut.”, we would simply train the model on next-step prediction over the concatenated input sequence “translate English to German: That is good. target: Das ist gut.” If we wanted to obtain the model’s prediction for this example, the model would be fed the prefix “translate English to German: That is good.
